mainSequence.step: User opens the Acadsync Application in the browser.
Browser sends an HTTP request to the Web Server.
Web Server forwards the request to the Django Application.
Django Application calls the appropriate view.
View queries/updates data in the Database.
Database returns the data to the View.
View renders the template with the data.
Django Application returns the response to the Web Server.
Web Server sends the HTTP response to the Browser.
Browser displays the response to the User.
